message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today at a price of $14,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond the asking price.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your generosity, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $10,000 for the product. Please let me know if this is within your range.
Bob, I understand your position, but $10,000 is significantly below its true value. I could come down to $13,000, which is a very competitive offer considering its worth.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, given my budget constraints, I can't go above $10,000 for the product. I hope we can reach an agreement that works for both of us.
